Hero.title_part1: The only apps you need to
Hero.description: Experience seamless logistics, ride-hailing, and delivery services all in one ecosystem. Connecting customers with trusted drivers instantly.

AppShowcase.description: Our app is designed to be intuitive and powerful. Manage your orders, track deliveries, and communicate with drivers in a few clicks.
AppShowcase.feature_1_desc: Visualize your courier on the map at any moment.
AppShowcase.feature_2_desc: Stay informed about your mission's progress.
AppShowcase.feature_3_desc: Pay safely with cash or card.

ServicesPreview.title: Our Core Services
ServicesPreview.description: Everything you need, delivered with care. We bridge the gap between efficiency and reliability.
ServicesPreview.service_1_desc: Get packages delivered locally in minutes. Fast, secure, and trackable.
ServicesPreview.service_2_desc: Need to move furniture or freight? Our trucks are ready for heavy lifting.
ServicesPreview.service_3_desc: Travel with verified drivers. Your safety is our top priority on every trip.
ServicesPreview.service_4_desc: Special care for fragile items. We ensure your goods arrive in perfect condition.

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.description: Simple steps to get moving. We've made it as easy as 1-2-3.
HowItWorks.step_1_desc: Get Sala for Android or iOS. Create your account in seconds.
HowItWorks.step_2_desc: Choose your service, set the location and confirm the details.
HowItWorks.step_3_desc: Track your delivery or driver in real time until the mission is complete.

ZigZagFeatures.feature_1_desc: Benefit from transparent algorithms that guarantee fair and competitive prices for every ride and delivery, with no hidden costs.
ZigZagFeatures.feature_2_desc: Safety first. Every Sala partner goes through a rigorous verification process to ensure total peace of mind.
ZigZagFeatures.feature_3_desc: Keep an eye on what matters. Track your orders or rides in real time with pinpoint GPS accuracy.
ZigZagFeatures.feature_4_desc: Manage your transactions effortlessly. Pay securely and benefit from a fair and instant refund policy when needed.

Testimonials.description: Discover why thousands of users and businesses choose Sala for their daily needs. Customer satisfaction at the heart of our mission.
Testimonials.review_1_content: Sala completely changed how I send gifts to my family. Fast and secure!
Testimonials.review_2_content: My customers are delighted with express delivery. Sala is a key partner for my growth.
Testimonials.review_3_content: The app is super intuitive. I use it for my daily commutes.
Testimonials.review_4_content: Customer service is very responsive. A reliable solution for pros.

AboutMetadata.title: About - Sala
AboutMetadata.description: Learn more about Sala's mission, vision, and the team driving the logistics revolution.

AboutHero.description: Sala is more than just a delivery app. We are a technology company dedicated to moving people and products safely, efficiently, and reliably.

MissionVision.mission_desc: Empower businesses and individuals by providing seamless, accessible, and reliable logistics solutions. We strive to reduce friction in transportation and make delivery instant for everyone, everywhere.
MissionVision.vision_desc: Become the region's leading super-app for mobility and logistics, creating an ecosystem where drivers thrive, businesses grow, and customers enjoy unmatched convenience.

OurStory.title: Our Story
OurStory.description: From humble beginnings to a logistics revolution.
OurStory.milestone_2021_desc: The idea of Sala is born from a need to simplify urban logistics.
OurStory.milestone_2022_desc: Initial launch in Algiers with a fleet of 10 drivers.
OurStory.milestone_2023_desc: Opening operations in Oran and launching B2B offer.
OurStory.milestone_2024_desc: AI integration for route optimization and Sala Pay launch.
OurStory.milestone_2025_desc: Transition to a hybrid and electric fleet to reduce carbon footprint.
OurStory.milestone_future_desc: International expansion and covering the entire MENA region.

CoreValues.title: Our Values
CoreValues.description: What defines us and pushes us forward.
CoreValues.value_1_desc: We place our customers at the heart of every decision we make.
CoreValues.value_2_desc: We constantly evolve to offer faster and smarter solutions.
CoreValues.value_3_desc: Transparency and honesty guide all our actions.
CoreValues.value_4_desc: We are committed to greener and more responsible logistics.

Team.title: Meet the Team
Team.description: The passionate minds behind the platform.

ServicesMetadata.title: Our Services - Sala
ServicesMetadata.description: Explore our wide range of delivery, transport, and logistics services available on the Sala app.

ServicesHero.description: From local express delivery to intercity freight transport, Sala offers a complete range of logistics services tailored to your requirements.

ServicesList.service_1_desc: Need it right now? Our instant delivery service gets your packages across the city in under 60 minutes. Ideal for documents, food, and urgent parcels.
ServicesList.service_2_desc: From furniture to construction materials, our truck fleet can handle any load size. Professional movers included upon request.
ServicesList.service_3_desc: Get where you need to go with our verified driver community. Real-time tracking, SOS features, and ride-sharing options available.
ServicesList.service_4_desc: Specialized service for electronics, glass, and art. We use protective packaging and dedicated handling to ensure zero damage.
ServicesList.service_5_desc: Shipping across the country? We offer scheduled long-distance trips with freight tracking at every step.
ServicesList.service_6_desc: Manage your shipments with ease. Real-time tracking, centralized billing, and management tools to optimize your logistics.

BusinessSolutions.description: Whether you are a small shop or a large enterprise, Sala offers the tools you need to shift gears.
BusinessSolutions.solution_1_desc: Outsource your logistics. We manage your deliveries while you focus on your core business.
BusinessSolutions.solution_2_desc: A dedicated space to manage all your professional deliveries in one place.
BusinessSolutions.solution_3_desc: Access detailed reports on your delivery performance and optimize your costs.

ServiceProcess.title: How We Process
ServiceProcess.description: A transparent and secure process from A to Z.
ServiceProcess.step_1_text: Book via the app in a few clicks.
ServiceProcess.step_3_text: Real-time GPS tracking of the trip.

ServiceCTA.title: Ready to get started?
ServiceCTA.description: Access all these services directly from your pocket. Download the Sala app today and discover the future of logistics.

ContactMetadata.title: Contact Us - Sala
ContactMetadata.description: Get in touch with the Sala team. We are here to answer your questions and discuss your logistics needs.

ContactHero.description: A question? A suggestion? Or just want to say hello? Our team is here to listen and answer you.

Footer.brand_desc: Your trusted partner for deliveries and transport. Connecting the world, one package at a time.

DownloadMetadata.title: Download App - Sala
DownloadMetadata.description: Download the Sala app for iOS and Android. Delivery, ride-hailing, and on-demand services in one single app.

DownloadHero.description: The ultimate app for delivery, transport, and on-demand services. Available now on iOS and Android.

AppFeatures.title: One App for Everyone
AppFeatures.description: Whether you want to order or deliver, Sala has the tool you need.
AppFeatures.driver_desc: Earn money on your own schedule.
AppFeatures.driver_benefit_1: Flexible hours, be your own boss

QRCodeSection.title: Scan to download
QRCodeSection.description: Simply point your phone's camera at the QR code to download the Sala app instantly.

FAQMetadata.title: FAQ - Sala
FAQMetadata.description: Answers to frequently asked questions about using Sala, deliveries, transport, and payments.

FAQHero.description: Have questions? We have answers. Discover everything you need to know about Sala.

FAQList.no_results: No results found for your search.
FAQList.still_questions_desc: If you can't find the answer to your question in our FAQ, don't hesitate to contact us directly.
FAQList.success_message: We have received your question and will get back to you as soon as possible.
FAQList.general_q1_answer: Sala is a logistics super-app that combines delivery, freight transport, ride-hailing, and other on-demand services into a single platform.
FAQList.general_q2_question: In which cities is Sala available?
FAQList.general_q2_answer: Currently, we operate primarily in Algiers, Oran, and Constantine, with nationwide expansion planned very soon.
FAQList.general_q3_question: How do I download the app?
FAQList.general_q3_answer: You can download the Sala app for free from the App Store (iOS) and Google Play Store (Android).
FAQList.deliveries_q1_answer: The price depends on the distance, the type of vehicle chosen, and urgency. You can get a precise estimate in the app before confirming your order.
FAQList.deliveries_q2_answer: Yes, absolutely. Sala offers real-time GPS tracking for all your deliveries and rides, from pickup to drop-off.
FAQList.deliveries_q3_question: What if my package is damaged?
FAQList.deliveries_q3_answer: We take great care of your items. If an incident occurs, contact our customer service immediately via the 'Complaints' section of the app or website for quick resolution.
FAQList.account_q1_question: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQList.account_q1_answer: We accept cash on delivery, as well as electronic payments via CIB and Edahabia cards directly in the app.
FAQList.account_q2_question: How do I become a driver partner?
FAQList.account_q2_answer: Download the 'Sala Driver' app, sign up, and submit the required documents. Our team will review your application within 48 hours.

ComplaintsMetadata.title: Complaints - Sala
ComplaintsMetadata.description: Report an issue with an order or service. We take your feedback very seriously.

ComplaintsHero.description: Whether it's for a complaint, a question, or simple feedback, our team is here to support you. Choose the option that fits your needs.

ComplaintsForm.description: Select a category to start your request.
ComplaintsForm.type_complaint_desc: Problem with an order or service.
ComplaintsForm.type_complaint_client_desc: I am a client and I have a problem with my order.
ComplaintsForm.type_complaint_livreur_desc: I am a driver and I have a problem with the app or service.
ComplaintsForm.success_message: Thank you for contacting us. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.description: How Sala collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
PrivacyPage.section1_content: At Sala, we take your privacy very seriously. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our mobile application and website.
PrivacyPage.section2_content: We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our services:
PrivacyPage.section2_list_1: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, delivery address.
PrivacyPage.section2_list_2: Location Data: To enable real-time tracking of deliveries and trips.
PrivacyPage.section2_list_3: Transaction Data: Order details, purchase history, and payment information.
PrivacyPage.section2_list_4: Technical Information: Device type, IP address, operating system.
PrivacyPage.section3_list_2: Manage your account and provide customer support.
PrivacyPage.section3_list_3: Improve our services and develop new features.
PrivacyPage.section3_list_4: Send you important updates and promotional offers (with your consent).
PrivacyPage.section4_content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information with:
PrivacyPage.section4_list_1: Driver Partners: To correct delivery or transport.
PrivacyPage.section4_list_2: Service Providers: For payment processing and data hosting.
PrivacyPage.section5_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, or destruction.
PrivacyPage.section6_content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can exercise these rights directly within the app settings or by contacting us at privacy@sala.dz.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Use
TermsPage.description: The rules and conditions governing the use of the Sala platform.
TermsPage.section1_content: By downloading or using the Sala app, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
TermsPage.section2_content: Sala is a technology platform connecting users seeking logistics/transport services with independent providers (drivers/couriers). Sala does not directly provide transport services.
TermsPage.section3_content: To use most features, you must create an account. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your credentials and all activities that occur under your account.
TermsPage.section4_list_1: Use the services only for lawful purposes.
TermsPage.section4_list_2: Not cause nuisance or damage to third-party providers.
TermsPage.section4_list_3: Not use the app to transport illegal or dangerous goods.
TermsPage.section5_content: Fares are shown in the app before ordering. You agree to pay all fees associated with the services you request. Sala reserves the right to modify fares at any time.
TermsPage.section6_content: To the extent permitted by law, Sala shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of the services.
TermsPage.section7_content: We may update these terms from time to time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page.
TermsPage.section8_content: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us at legal@sala.dz.

Newsletter.description: Receive our new features, exclusive offers, and tips to optimize your deliveries in preview.
